Eddy Lin.description: conversing about conversing about collaborating on a music composition project exploring the influence of language and literature @ <persona> Ayesha Khan
chat: Eddy Lin
Hey Ayesha! I noticed you were listening to the lecture. What did you think of it?
Ayesha Khan
I thought the lecture was really interesting! The professor provided some great insights on how language can shape meaning in literature.
Eddy Lin
I agree, the professor definitely made some thought-provoking points. Have you ever thought about applying those ideas to music composition?
Ayesha Khan

Yes, actually! I've always been fascinated by the relationship between language and music. I think it would be interesting to explore how language can influence the composition process and the overall message of a musical piece. Have you ever created music with a specific language or literary theme in mind?
Eddy Lin

That's really cool! I haven't specifically created music with a language or literary theme in mind, but I'd love to give it a try. Maybe we can collaborate on a project together and explore that idea further!
Ayesha Khan
That sounds like a great idea! I would love to collaborate with you on a project exploring the influence of language and literature on music composition. We can discuss it further after our classes.
Eddy Lin
I'm really excited about this collaboration! Let's plan to meet up after our classes and discuss our project in more detail.
Ayesha Khan
What time will you be done with your classes?
Eddy Lin
I'll be done with my classes at 5:00 pm. How about we meet at 5:30 pm at Hobbs Cafe?
Ayesha Khan
That works for me! I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe at 5:30 pm.
